snippet: Foursquare, the popular location-based mobile service, is rolling out a new design that focuses on making recommendations, instead of just prompting users to check in. The change transforms Foursquare into something closer to a Facebook-style social...
abstract: Foursquare, the popular location-based mobile service, is rolling out a new design that focuses on making recommendations, instead of just prompting users to check in. The change transforms Foursquare into something closer to a Facebook-style social network.

headline.main: A Tour of Foursquare's Redesigned App
